publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1663 Stuart McMillan: Greenock Academy Hailed as Best in Scotlandâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the recent announcement that Greenock Academy has been recognised as one of the best schools in Scotland; acknowledges the report from HM Inspectorate of Education that it was rated the best non-denominational school in Scotland, and recognises that within the Inverclyde area there is a high standard of education provision which is reflected in the recent glowing appraisal of Greenock Academy. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Ross Finnie*, Bob Doris*, Jamie McGrigor* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-1663 Greenock Academy Hailed as Best in Scotland (lodged on 31 March 2008) Annabel Goldie*
